sub_title: MSc | Mambu | Cloud | Financial Services | Core Banking solutions
summary:
A driven individual who is thirsty for knowledge and believes that learning has no limits. For that reason I did two emphasis in business and continued my graduate degree. I was able to do so with two full scholarships ( MEPI Tomorrow’s leaders scholarship for my Bachelors and the Swedish Institute for future Leaders’ scholarship for my Masters). It did not stop there of course, I continued my learning by attending courses and conferences.

I consider myself to be very dynamic and adaptive to the environment I am in. As you can see I am a Jordanian citizen who lived in Lebanon for four years, 3 months in the United States, a year in Sweden and now I live in Luxembourg. I have been able to adapt to such different cultures and enrich my life journey with memorable and life changing experiences.

When it comes to my professional life and career I was admitted to join one of the most prestigious graduate programs in Jordan with Arab Bank PLC in 2015. I have been able to prove myself with my hard work thus I was given the chance to improve processes, handling individual and group projects, conducting meetings and providing out of the box solutions.
In 2018, I had the privilege to join the number one banking software provider in the world, Temenos, for the Sales Academy program in Luxembourg. Then went back to Dubai to support the MEA region as an inside sales executive. After that I had the privilege to change my career path into a pre sales consultant to gain more functional knowledge.
In 2020, I joined Mambu in Amsterdam, netherlands as a pre sales consultant/solution engineer! 

Interested in:#Financial Services FS, banking sector, Consumer Analysis and market research, data analysis, consulting, entrepreneurship, startups, digital banking, global companies, big data, analytics, banking software

Fluent in English and Arabic

Global Arab Bank PLC 


Job description:
1- Prepare and analyze the executive summaries and reports along with analyzing countries Elite dashboards and Elite sales reports and providing a comprehensive view of the performance of the Elite program globally.
2- Assist in implementing and measuring the strategy and value proposition for the consumer banking and specifically the Elite program.
3- Ensure the implementation of the Elite program across countries by providing constant contact and support for all Elite teams and related departments.
4-Assist in the preparation of the program enhancements, solutions, follow ups with the required departments, ensure completion and measuring those implementations.
5-Ensure successful implementation of the marketing campaigns, business plans related to the Elite program, update marketing material as well as constant follow ups on all Marketing items.
